summary: Business website for college project: NK SYSTECH (CCTV, workstations, networking, laptops/computers) multibrand sales and service.
known_issues: Production deployment failed with a deployment error (needs investigation/fix before launch).
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Replace the site logo with the newly uploaded image (nk.png > nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-section business website for “NK SYSTECH” with clear navigation and content for: Home, About, Services, and Contact.
Add a Services area that clearly lists and describes NK SYSTECH offerings for: CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, and Computers, emphasizing multibrand sales and service.
Add a simple “Products / Multibrand Sales & Service” listing component to showcase categories (not individual SKUs) relevant to CCTV and computer/networking equipment.

Implement a Contact section/page with a form that collects: name, phone number, email, service interest (dropdown), and message; submit the inquiry to the backend for storage and show success/error feedback in the UI.

Apply a cohesive visual theme suitable for a tech services business (e.g., clean industrial tech) using a consistent color palette, typography, spacing, and components across all pages/sections (avoid default/unstyled template look).
Add a footer with NK SYSTECH basic business info placeholders (address placeholder, phone placeholder, email placeholder) and quick links to Home/About/Services/Contact.
Add generated static image assets to the frontend and use them in the UI (logo in header/footer, hero/banner on Home, icons/illustrations in Services).

Update the website contact information to include the owner’s details: Owner Name: NANDHAKUMAR G, Phone: 9080250925, Email: nandhakumar.g2402@gmail.com. Replace the existing placeholder phone and email values in the footer, and display the owner name alongside the contact information using clear English labels (e.g., “Owner: …”).
Investigate and fix the root cause of the production deployment failure so the project can successfully build and deploy.

Update the backend ServiceInterest enum to use NK SYSTECH-related variants (CCTV, Workstations, Networking, Laptops, Computers, Other) instead of the current energy-themed variants, and update the frontend mapping so the contact form submits and displays the correct service interest values end-to-end.
Remove or gate the testing-only inquiry debug panel ("View Submitted Inquiries (Testing)") so it does not appear in the production UI.

Update the site’s displayed contact information to include the business address: "9/16-18, VOC STREET-04, PEELAMEDU MAINROAD, SOWRIPALAYAM, COIMBATORE, TAMILNADU - 641028" in the footer contact information area, using an English label ("Address:") and readable multi-line formatting.
Remove the Phone Number field from the Contact/Enquiry form UI and update the form state + validation + submission so users can submit an inquiry without providing a phone number.
Replace the current NK SYSTECH logo used in the site header and footer with the user-submitted logo image, keeping the existing logo asset path used by the UI.

Replace the currently used NK SYSTECH logo image with the newly uploaded logo (nk.png) while keeping the existing logo asset path used by the UI: /assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png. The updated logo must appear anywhere that path is used (including the header and footer) without requiring code changes to the img src path.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a business website for NK SYSTECH with pages/sections for Home, About, Services (CCTV/Workstation/Networking/Laptops/Computers), and Contact
Add product/service listing focused on multibrand sales and service for CCTV, computers, laptops, networking, and workstations
Add owner contact details (Owner: NANDHAKUMAR G, Phone: 9080250925, Email: nandhakumar.g2402@gmail.com) to the site (e.g., footer/contact section)
Add business address to the website (Footer/Contact): 9/16-18, VOC STREET-04, PEELAMEDU MAINROAD, SOWRIPALAYAM, COIMBATORE, TAMILNADU - 641028
Update the enquiry/contact form to remove the Phone Number field/option from the enquiry section
Replace the current site logo with the user-submitted logo asset (update header/footer/any logo usage)
